parameters.WHIP: Number of walks and hits per inning pitched
parameters.HitsAllowed: Number of hits against the team
parameters.Losses: Number of losses for the season
parameters.StrikeOuts: Number of strikeouts (by the team's pitchers)
parameters.Wins: Number of wins for the season (out of 162 games)
parameters.Saves: Number of games saved (by the team's pitchers)
parameters.ERA: Earned run average (earned runs allowed per 9 innings)

description:
Description
Major League Baseball (MLB) standings and team statistics for the 2016 season
title: MLB Standings in 2016
usage: A data frame with 30 observations on the following 21 variables.
reference: Data for all 30 Major League Baseball (MLB) teams for the 2016 regular season. This includes team batting statistics (BattingAvg through SLG) and team pitching statistics (ERA through WHIP)
